project_abstract.cdata: The Vocational Training Project's objectives are: (a) to help increase the Government's capability to plan, manage and evaluate skill training; (b) accelerate the output and improve the quality of skill training institutions; and (c) improve the productivity of employed workers. It will consist of: (a) construction, furniture and equipment for the National Training Development Institute, and for 6 new training centers; (b) rehabilitating and re-equipping of 31 existing centers; (c) furniture and equipment for the Secretariats of the National Training Board and the Provincial Training Boards; (d) incremental staff salaries and preparation of future projects; (e) staff training; and (f) technical assistance, to be financed by the UNDP.
